resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.

fields.description:
{html}

Very easy to replicate. Run KitchenSink on Android 2.2, navigate to the "Soft Input Focus" test case.

In 2.2:
Button is tapped Keyboard slides out Window closes Keyboard slides in

Obviously the keyboard should not be sliding in at the end.

{html}
fields.summary: Android: SOFT_KEYBOARD_HIDE_ON_FOCUS not working in Android 2.2

comments.body:
Tested on a Samsung Galaxy S2 using TiSDK 2.2.0v20120821095711, unable to reproduce. 

Ticket marked as resolved.
Closing ticket as the issue cannot be reproduced.
